channel.title: KenSmith tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from KenSmith.

item.description: "Biden did what he had to do. We have reached a watershed in American politics. The president of the United States has told us directly that our system of government is under attack. What happens next is, in every way, up to us." https://t.co/Rz7BuYtq9s
item.source:markdown: "Biden did what he had to do. We have reached a watershed in American politics. The president of the United States has told us directly that our system of government is under attack. What happens next is, in every way, up to us." https://t.co/Rz7BuYtq9s

item.description: Where we Hoosiers go for our state-level gerrymandering and other related who-needs-democracy-anyway services. https://t.co/B4fPdefMoj
item.source:markdown: Where we Hoosiers go for our state-level gerrymandering and other related who-needs-democracy-anyway services. https://t.co/B4fPdefMoj

item.description:
An unproven, unlikely, or even bogus idea can serve as a “necessary myth” that establishes the reasons for perpetrating injustice.

Especially if the idea is repeated loud and long, in Bannon and Breitbart fashion. From @RealRvw over on Insta. https://t.co/CaES8TbHmM
item.source:markdown:
